meanings.definition: The quality or state of being bountiful.
meanings.sent1: Her bountifulness in sharing her toys with others made her a beloved friend.
meanings.sent2: The bountifulness of the harvest brought joy to the farmers.
meanings.sent3: The bountifulness of cookies at the party was a pleasant surprise for everyone.
meanings.sent4: His bountifulness of knowledge on the subject amazed his classmates.
meanings.sent5: The bountifulness of the forest after the rain was a sight to behold.

meanings.definition: The act of being generous or plentiful.
meanings.sent1: Their bountifulness in donating to charity helped many in need.
meanings.sent2: The bountifulness of gifts during the holiday season brought smiles to all.
meanings.sent3: The bountifulness of ice cream scoops in the bowl made the children giggle.
meanings.sent4: The bountifulness of stars in the night sky was a breathtaking sight.
meanings.sent5: The bountifulness of opportunities in the city inspired her to pursue her dreams.
